posts.post_content:
I have a lot of 12 SC 350/ 25 backs. I'd like to sell either a group of nine together: Rossman, Cree, Hemphill, Downey/field, Dubuc, Stovall/port, McElveen, Mowrey and Oldring/field  $250

Or all 12 together, which includes Josh Clark, which has a print line up top and is in nice(r) shape, a Hobe Ferris with a miscut back and a Rhoades, arm extended which has a couple color shifts and his arm extends into the border  $425 for all 12

 Scans coming shortly on all of them.

Lowered prices on the groups. $425 for all or $250 for the group of nine. Some of these cards have sold for crazy prices, not sure which ones are tough, but there could be a hidden gem in the group. Feel free to make any offers, operators are standing by
